TopicTitle: Look Who's Moved into the KSC!

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/30e868319422f17aaad812b65b4ea6fc/tumblr_inline_naqfs9CWkN1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>As revealed by Maxmaps on today’s Squadcast, here’s your first look at a work in progress version of 0.25’s brand new Administration Building.</p>

oh my god oh my god

Now... what does it do?
I smell cheap suits...

Wait, wait, wait....

It has a Heli pad, and I think I remember a (buggy) hinge (that lets you twirl parts)

Just speculation, but HELICOPTERS!!!
More VTOL action. Are you sure it's too early for the Hypeplane.
That looks great! I still don't know what it does though.

I still don't know what it does though.

It's the Administration Building. It administers things.

That looks great! I still don't know what it does though.

You'll find out with time, tygoo
Curious who modeled this one. It looks nice, and matches the style of the existing KSC well.
Thank goodness that's an "H" on top of the building instead of a "bullseye". That would be sure to attract most of my launch debris.

Curious who modeled this one. It looks nice, and matches the style of the existing KSC well.

There are some that call him.... Nick. [That's all Max said on the Squadcast]
What it does is insignificant. More importantly, what does the Fox say?

Thank goodness that's an "H" on top of the building instead of a "bullseye". That would be sure to attract most of my launch debris.

now i want a building with a bullseye.

Thank goodness that's an "H" on top of the building instead of a "bullseye". That would be sure to attract most of my launch debris.

Shhhhhhhhhh! Don't give them ideas!

Wait, wait, wait....

It has a Heli pad, and I think I remember a (buggy) hinge (that lets you twirl parts)

Just speculation, but HELICOPTERS!!!

Nah, the VAB has helicopter pads on top too. Good targets for capsules on a return trajectory.

You guys can just plop that down any old time, It'll give me something new to land on. Not worried about what it does just yet, but it looks like a nice place to hang my hat.... or in this case.. my giant rocket.

That looks great! I still don't know what it does though.

well....It sits there and looks cool, DUH! lol

Fanworks Fridays: Squad edition.

Looks great!

More VTOL action. Are you sure it's too early for the Hypeplane.

I'll hop on board that Hypeplane. Sounds great!
me think that someone should ask some advice from b9, model are good, but not as good as it can be.
hmm from the shape of the building i can discern that it will be placed in between the tracking station and R&D department....
Does it have a ladder or stairs up to the helipad? Looks awesome.

You guys can just plop that down any old time, It'll give me something new to land on. Not worried about what it does just yet, but it looks like a nice place to hang my hat.... or in this case.. my giant rocket.

We don't want to hear about where you hang your giant rocket.....

Thank goodness that's an "H" on top of the building instead of a "bullseye". That would be sure to attract most of my launch debris.

Should be an optional firespitter texture IMO.

me think that someone should ask some advice from b9, model are good, but not as good as it can be.

Please remember that this is still very much a work in progress.

Please remember that this is still very much a work in progress.

On the topic of that, I feel that it could afford to have slightly more polygons making up the cylindrical section. As it stands, it feels rather blocky for what it is.
